content: Looking to implement vital signs - the US Core v4 IG does not have an Observations profile or a VitalSigns profile. What is the recommended implementation?
Use the base specs vital signs profile: http://hl7.org/fhir/R4/observation-vitalsigns.html
Just trying to figure out why it is not in the newest us core IG
a US Core version of vital signs will be added to US Core in next release. It will be virtually the same but the mustsupport will be more granular
